summary: --Doesn't require Dawnguard-- This mod changes the base damage of Skyrim's vanilla bows to make them more useful in Dawnguard. Patches for Dawnguard and Dragonborn bows.
descriptionHtml:
I never though this would get even 100 downloads :D Thank you all!

I have Dawnguard DLC and all the crossbow stuff, but I prefer basic bows. I found crossbows overpowered compared to them, so I decided to increase their damage. I made this mod for myself, but I thought I'd share it with you.

This simple mod only changes the base damage of bows, not arrows. Wouldn't want them too powerful, right? Even dragons deserve to have a chance. :D

Added Dawnguard and Dragonborn files to the optional files. Changed Nordic, Stahlrim, Dragonbone and Auriels bow.

Can't add patch to Immersive Weapons by hothtrooper ._. I'll keep trying.
I can't make the mod compatible with ACE Archery ;_; If someone can, feel free to do so.

Stats of the Vanilla bows without the mod (out of order, I know :P)
Character is a female Orc level 1

[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/41950-2-1378810659.png[/img]

And with the mod (I know, I know :/)

[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/41950-1-1378809943.png[/img]
author: FantasyWolf
